title: Episode #68 "Join the Club"
description:
Ricky Gervais joins Michael Imperioli and Steve Schirripa this week on Talking Sopranos. Ricky is a huge fan of the Sopranos, a show which he calls “A Masterpiece”. He talks about why he believes the show was so successful, and of course his take on the ending. He also talks about his career, The Office, and his latest show After Life. Ricky also talks about hosting the Golden Globes and what people thought about his performance afterwards. 

     Then Michael and Steve break down what could be one of the most complicated episodes of the entire series. In this one Tony is Kevin Finnerty and the entire episode is one long dream…or is it. There’s a lot of hidden meanings and Michael tries to lay it all out for us. Is he reading to much into it…. or is he absolutely on point….Check it out and make your own decision. Talking Sopranos #68 “Join the Club” S6-Ep2. Don’t forget to subscribe to the Talking Sopranos podcast wherever you get your podcasts and go to the talking sopranos website to ask questions and buy official merchandise.

See Zopa live at the Mercury Lounge in NYC. Click the link below for more details. 

http://www.mercuryeastpresents.com/mercurylounge

https://www.talkingsopranos.com

https://www.betterhelp.com/talking

https://nordvpn.com/sopranos

https://www.untuckit.com

Get Tickets for Conversations with Sopranos October 2nd at the Packard Music Hall. Warren OH. 

https://packardmusichall.com

https://www.ticketmaster.com
author: talkingsopranos@gmail.com (Steve Schirripa, Michael Imperioli, Ricky Gervais)
